text: "Blue and Yellow" is the third single from the Used's self-titled debut album The Used. It was released to radio on May 20, 2003 and a music video was released around the same time. This song is about the friendship between Bert and Quinn.Songfacts - Blue and Yellow ==Music video== The music video was not filmed at a video shoot but instead is a compilation of video clips of the band over the previous 2 years. It starts with the band playing in a small room. It transfers between Bert singing in a blue room and clips of the band live and touring.
